title: My prepaid card dosnt work and i tried it once
body: i got a prepaid card from EBGames and then i went home i typed in the code but it says ive used it many time when ive used it once? can some1 help me with this

replies.body:
>used it many time when ive used it once

You can *only* use a card once. Could you get a screen-shot of the error?
